front.title: Proxy Mobile IPv6 Basic Multicast Support Solution

abstract.t: This document describes how multicast routing can be supported inProxy Mobile IPv6 in a way similar to Mobile IPv6. Mobile AccessGateway tunnels MLD messages from the mobile nodes to local mobilityanchor. Local mobility anchor joins the multicast group and startsforwarding the received multicast packets to the mobile accessgateway. In case of handover the tunnel end point changes but theoperation remains anchored at the local mobility anchor.
